text: Gala is a variety of eating and cooking apple. This variety is crisp, juicy and sweet. The skin color of the fruit is non-uniform. It usually has a red skin that can have some additional yellow color. The gala apple was created in New Zealand by crossing Kiddâ€™s orange red and golden delicious apples. In the United States, it was projected in 2019 to be the most highly produced apple variety. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Apples Category:New Zealand food
title: Gala (apple)
